properties.entry: SELECT QUE_NO, INQ_TYPE, QUE_TITLE, QUE_CONTENT, QUE_ST, MEMBER_NO, SPACE_NO, TO_CHAR(QUE_DT,'YYYY"." MM"." DD"." HH24":"MI":"SS') QUE_DT , SPACE_NM , SPACE_IMG_PATH, SPACE_IMG_NM, SPACE_IMG_ORG FROM QUESTION LEFT JOIN SPACE USING(SPACE_NO) LEFT JOIN SPACE_IMG USING(SPACE_NO) WHERE (SPACE_IMG_LEVEL = 1 OR SPACE_IMG_LEVEL IS NULL) AND MEMBER_NO = ?

SELECT QUE_NO, INQ_TYPE, QUE_TITLE, QUE_CONTENT, QUE_ST, MEMBER_NO, SPACE_NO, TO_CHAR(QUE_DT,'YYYY"." MM"." DD"." HH24":"MI":"SS') QUE_DT , SPACE_NM , SPACE_IMG_PATH, SPACE_IMG_NM, SPACE_IMG_ORG FROM QUESTION LEFT JOIN SPACE USING(SPACE_NO) LEFT JOIN SPACE_IMG USING(SPACE_NO) WHERE SPACE_NO is null AND MEMBER_NO = ?

SELECT QUE_NO, INQ_TYPE, QUE_TITLE, QUE_CONTENT, QUE_ST, MEMBER_NO, SPACE_NO, TO_CHAR(QUE_DT,'YYYY"." MM"." DD"." HH24":"MI":"SS') QUE_DT , SPACE_NM , SPACE_IMG_PATH, SPACE_IMG_NM, SPACE_IMG_ORG FROM QUESTION JOIN SPACE USING(SPACE_NO) JOIN SPACE_IMG USING(SPACE_NO) WHERE SPACE_NO =12 AND SPACE_IMG_LEVEL = 1 AND MEMBER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO QUESTION VALUES (QUESTION_SEQ_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, ?, ?)
